Please expect a call from us shortly.

{% if not request.is_featured %}What next?{% else %} What next?{% endif %}

After the call, we'll send you detailed profiles of the top tutors in your area who match your requirements, and are most qualified to produce the results you seek.

You'll be able to review each tutor's credentials, experience and portfolio and make your choice. Then we'll connect you with the tutor after payment is made and create a detailed lesson plan so that we can monitor service delivery.

{% if not request.is_featured %}How Payment Works{% else %} How Payment Works{% endif %}

In order to protect you and your tutor, we require full, upfront payment to be made before lessons start which is loaded safely to your wallet on Tuteria until all your lessons are fully delivered and confirmed by you before we transfer payment to the tutor at the end.

This enables us secure your payments, monitor tutor's performance, ensure quality service, provide awesome support and also respond to any emergencies that might arise.

Your lessons are guaranteed. If you are not 100% happy with your tutor, we will instantly replace them at no extra cost or promptly refund the cost of lessons not taught.

Tuteria in the News

Mark Zuckerberg commends Tuteria Nigeria

Facebook's Founder and CEO, Mark Zuckerberg commended Tuteria Nigeria for the work it is doing in ensuring quality education having facilitated learning for thousands of happy students from the highest quality tutors.

Tuteria wins Africa Impact Award - BellaNaija

Tuteria emerged one of the Impact Award Winners for Facebook's Internet.org Africa Innovation Challenge for Education and Economic Empowerment. Tuteria previously won Innovation Prize for Africa and Microsoft Awards, both covered by BellaNaija.

President Buhari, commends Tuteria Nigeria

30 Most Innovative startups in Nigeria were selected to meet with President Buhari, and Vice President Osinbajo as Aso Villa, Abuja for their innovation and impact, and Tuteria is proud of have been one of the top 30.

ChannelsTV's Network Africa program featured Tuteria to discuss her innovative solution to providing access to quality education in Nigeria.
